thread.title: Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar

title: Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar
text:
Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar 1:48pm BST - 01:18 
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it says can give chocolate bars reduced calories as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments. Matthew Larotonda reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it says can give chocolate bars reduced calories as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments.
